channel.title: Posts on Alex Kopf
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Alex Kopf

item.title: Do NHL Goalies Perform Better in the Postseason?
item.description: If you watch any team oriented sport, you will hear the phrase “Defense wins championships,”. However, I believe that in the NHL your goalie’s performance is even more enhanced compared to the regular season. If you watch the NHL playoffs most will agree there isn’t many other postseasons like it. The energy is unmatched. My belief is that if your goalie becomes “hot” in the playoffs they will win more games.

item.title: Cleaning data
item.description: I am going to determine which games this college football season had the worst score differential library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.3 ✓ dplyr 1.0.2 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.4.0 ✓ forcats 0.5.0 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() badlogs <- read.
